title: Honor Rank Up But It Really Didnt?
body: I am currently dishonorable. But after  a couple of days at the end of a game it said i was promoted to honor 1. When i go to my profile it still shows that i am dishonorable. Please help

replies.body: That message was most likely letting you know that your rewards were unlocked. When you first become dishonorable, hextech rewards will be locked. After showing some improvement they'll open back up again so you can start getting chests and keys. Currently, you're still at Honor rank 0, but you are now progressing at a normal rate again. Keep up the good behavior and you'll start ranking up again soon.
